thread.title: BRIEF-Playtech to challenge Irish central bank decision on Ava Trade deal
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Playtech to challenge Irish central bank decision on Ava Trade deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Playtech to challenge Irish central bank decision on Ava Trade deal
text:
Oct 6 Playtech Plc
* Update on acquisition of Ava Trade Ltd
* Central Bank of Ireland has reverted to company's Irish legal advisers and clarified its position
* Following this communication and having taken legal advice, company intends to formally challenge decision Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
